short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Override browser's new tab page with an empty (but editable) tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension for overriding the newtab page with an editable blank page. Such page drains less battery than the default newtab page, is less distracting, and being editable allows users to label their browser windows.
